feature_model.name: Stack PL

meta.data: A feature model of a simple stack data structure
Markus Voelter, Using Domain-Specific Languages for Product Line Engineering, Tutorial at SPLC 2009, San Francisco, USA

feature_model.feature_tree: :r Stack(_id_0) :o Size(_id_1) :g (_id_2) [1,1] : Fixed(_id_3) :m Value(_id_4) : Dynamic(_id_5) :m Element Type(_id_6) :g (_id_7) [1,1] : Integer(_id_8) : Float(_id_9) : String(_id_10) :o Optimization(_id_11) :g (_id_12) [1,1] : Speed(_id_13) : Memory Usage(_id_14) :o Counter(_id_15) :o Additional Features(_id_16) :g (_id_17) [1,*] : Thread Safety(_id_18) : Bounds Check(_id_19) : Type Check(_id_20)
